title: Is Quaden Bayles 18 Years Old?
subtitle: After receiving financial support from a wide range of celebrities, a bullied boy with dwarfism was accused of lying about his age.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Quaden Bayles is an 18-year-old man who lied about being a 9-year-old boy with dwarfism to scam the internet for money.
